issues.message: Remove this conditional structure or edit its code blocks so that they're not all the same.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "network-filter-to-be-replaced" 4 times.
Add a description to this table.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "another-http-filter" 4 times.
Add a description to this table.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "http-filter3" 3 times.
Add a description to this table.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "http-filter2" 10 times.
Add a description to this table.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "network-filter-should-not-be-replaced" 4 times.
